Package math

Class Plane2D

java.lang.Object
math.Plane2D
public class Plane2D
extends java.lang.Object
The Class Plane2D. This class uses Vector2 from the game world to create Vector3 points to create and calculate planes accordingly. Points must be entered counterclockWise

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Plane2D​(Vector2 p1, Vector2 p2)
    Plane 2 D.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculatePlane()
    This method calculates the plane and fills the a,b,c,and d variables.
    Vector2 getIntersect​(Vector2 v1, Vector2 v2)
    This method calculates the intersection point where the line/vector intersects the plane.
    TwoTuple<Vector2,​java.lang.Float> getIntersectWithRay​(Vector2 v1, Vector2 ray)
    Method that returns the intersection point and 'time' when intersection occurs
    Vector2 getMidPoint()
    Method that get the center point between the end two points
    Vector2 getNorm()
    This method calculates the norm vector for the plane.
    void printPlane()
    Method that prints the plane calculation

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Plane 2 D.
      Parameters:
      p1 - - Point 1 Must be counter clockWise
      p2 - - Point 2

  • Method Details

    • calculatePlane

      public void calculatePlane()
      This method calculates the plane and fills the a,b,c,and d variables.

    • getIntersect

      public Vector2 getIntersect​(Vector2 v1, Vector2 v2)
      This method calculates the intersection point where the line/vector intersects the plane. The two parameters are the beginning point and the end point.
      Parameters:
      v1 - the first position
      v2 - the final position
      Returns:
      vector the intersection Vector

    • getIntersectWithRay

      public TwoTuple<Vector2,​java.lang.Float> getIntersectWithRay​(Vector2 v1, Vector2 ray)
      Method that returns the intersection point and 'time' when intersection occurs
      Parameters:
      v1 - - the original point
      ray - - the ray vector from the original point
      Returns:
      TwoTuple - intersection point, 'time'

    • getNorm

      public Vector2 getNorm()
      This method calculates the norm vector for the plane.
      Returns:
      vector - normal

    • getMidPoint

      public Vector2 getMidPoint()
      Method that get the center point between the end two points
      Returns:
      Vector2 center points

    • printPlane

      public void printPlane()
      Method that prints the plane calculation
